title: React Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built using React, showcasing projects and skills.

title: MERN Stack E-commerce App
description: An e-commerce application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) including user authentication and payment integration.

title: React Task Manager
description: A task management app developed using React, featuring task creation, editing, and deletion.

title: MERN Stack Social Media App
description: A social media platform built with the MERN stack, including features like posts, comments, and likes.

title: React Blog Platform
description: A blog platform created with React, allowing users to create, edit, and delete blog posts.

title: React Weather App
description: A weather application built using React that fetches weather data from a public API.

title: MERN Stack Job Portal
description: A job portal application built with the MERN stack, featuring job listings and applications.

title: React Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application developed using React and WebSocket.

title: MERN Stack Event Management System
description: An event management system built with the MERN stack, allowing users to create and manage events.

title: React E-learning Platform
description: An e-learning platform created using React, featuring courses, quizzes, and progress tracking.
